long_description: With 2 speeds and a coaster brake, the GT Meatball Bike offers the clean look of a fixed gear with the smooth physique of a city bike. SRAM Automatix 2-speed hub reads your speed and shifts automatically into the higher gear when your speed picks up; to downshift for hill climbing, just coast momentarily. Rear coaster brake is easy and intuitive to use; simply backpedal to engage the brake. Schwalbe Kojak tires roll smoothly on city streets. Aluminum frame offers lightweight durability. Specs on the GT Meatball Bike are subject to change. Closeout.
short_description: With 2 speeds and a coaster brake, the GT Meatball Bike offers the clean look of a fixed gear with the smooth physique of a city bike.
